title: Got dodge timer after I couldn't even join champ select.
body:
I've just received a 15 minute dodge timer, not that big of a deal right? But its how I received it that pisses me off. I click accept, but I get put back into the queue screen instead of champ select. My friend sitting next to me joins, but I'm left stranded in limbo. For the entirety of champion select I missed out on it and eventually as it ended, I got given a dodge punishment for effectively no reason on my part. About a minute after, my league client popped up and made me "join" the champion select, which already ended a while ago, but it played through the music and went super fast before sticking me into an "asset-less" champion select screen with no way to exit it besides from clicking the default X button at the top, which still has the queue dodge warning.

Wtf???

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing sync and leaving you behind.  If your other friends on the same network as you are playing without issue, then the problem may be isolated to your PC.  To rule out any possibilities, go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  The instructions there will get you back in sync, but test it in custom games just in case!
